Package utlities

Class ValidationUtils

java.lang.Object
utlities.ValidationUtils
public class ValidationUtils extends Object
This class contains methods to handle validations for the application's GUI.
Author:
David Long

      public ValidationUtils()

  • Method Details

    • loginIsEmpty

      public static boolean loginIsEmpty(javafx.scene.control.TextField fieldId, String labelTxt)
      This method takes in a TextField and its label from the Login form and checks to see if the TextField is empty. If the field is empty, the "loginBlankAlert" method is called, then the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      fieldId - the fxId of the TextField being checked
      labelTxt - the TextField's label
      Returns:
      "true" if the TextField is empty, otherwise "false"

    • loginIsEmpty

      public static boolean loginIsEmpty(javafx.scene.control.PasswordField fieldId, String labelTxt)
      This method takes in a PasswordField and its label from the Login form and checks to see if the TextField is empty. If the field is empty, the "loginBlankAlert" method is called, then the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      fieldId - the fxId of the PasswordField being checked
      labelTxt - the PasswordField's label
      Returns:
      "true" if the PasswordField is empty, otherwise "false"

    • fldIsEmpty

      public static boolean fldIsEmpty(javafx.scene.control.TextField fieldId, String labelTxt)
      This method takes in a TextField and its label and checks to see if the TextField is empty. If the field is empty, the "blankFldAlert" method is called, then the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      fieldId - the fxId of the TextField being checked
      labelTxt - the TextField's label
      Returns:
      "true" if the TextField is empty, otherwise "false"

    • boxNotSelected

      public static boolean boxNotSelected(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox boxId, String labelTxt)
      This method takes in a ComboBox and its label and checks to see if the ComboBox has a selection made. If the selection is null, the "noSelectionAlert" method is called and the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      boxId - the fxId of the ComboBox being checked
      labelTxt - the ComboBox's label
      Returns:
      "true" if the ComboBox selection is null, otherwise "false"

    • dateNotSelected

      public static boolean dateNotSelected(javafx.scene.control.DatePicker pickerId, String labelTxt)
      This method takes in a DatePicker and its label and checks to see if the DatePicker has a selection made. If the selection is null, the "noSelectionAlert" method is called and the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      pickerId - the fxId of the DatePicker being checked
      labelTxt - the DatePicker's label
      Returns:
      "true" if the DatePicker selection is null, otherwise "false"

    • getUserId

      public static Object getUserId(String userName, String passWord) throws SQLException
      This method takes in a username and password, then executes a query which returns a matching ID object from the USERS table. If there is no user with same username and password, it returns a null object.
      Parameters:
      userName - The user's username
      passWord - The user's password
      Returns:
      If it exists, the user's ID, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors

    • customerHasAppts

      public static boolean customerHasAppts(Customer selectedCustomer) throws SQLException
      This method takes in a customer and checks the list of all appointments in the database to see if there are any appointments with the customer's ID. If there is a matching appointment, the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomer - the customer to be checked for matching appointments
      Returns:
      "true" if there is an appointment containing a customer ID matching the customer's ID, otherwise "false
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors

    • endIsBeforeStart

      public static boolean endIsBeforeStart(LocalTime apptStart, LocalTime apptEnd)
      This method compares the appointment starting time to the appointment ending time for validation. If the appointment ending time is before or equal to the appointment starting time, the "apptTimesAlert" method is called and the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      apptStart - the appointment starting time
      apptEnd - the appointment ending time
      Returns:
      "true" if end time is before or equal to start time, otherwise "false"

    • outsideBussHours

      public static boolean outsideBussHours(LocalTime apptStart, LocalTime apptEnd)
      This method compares the appointment starting time to the start of business hours and the appointment ending time to the end of business hours. If the proposed start is before 8am or the proposed end is after 10pm, the "businessHoursAlert" method is called and the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      apptStart - the appointment starting time
      apptEnd - the appointment ending time
      Returns:
      "true" if start is before 8am or end is after 10pm, otherwise "false"

    • custApptOverlaps

      public static boolean custApptOverlaps(int apptCustomerId, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      This method takes in the customer Id from the proposed appointment and compares that customer's existing appointment times for overlap with the proposed appointment start/end time period by means of 3 possible scenarios. If any of the 3 possible overlap scenarios is true, the "overlapAlert" method is called and the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      apptCustomerId - the proposed appointment's customer Id
      start - the proposed appointment's starting time
      end - the proposed appointment's ending time
      Returns:
      "true" if the proposed appointment time period overlaps any of the scenarios, otherwise "false"
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors

    • custApptOverlaps

      public static boolean custApptOverlaps(int apptId, int apptCustomerId, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end) throws SQLException
      This method takes in the Id from the appointment being updated and customer Id from the proposed appointment. The appointment being updated is ignored for overlap with itself, then the customer's existing appointment times are compared with the proposed appointment start/end time period for overlap by means of 3 possible scenarios. If any of the 3 possible overlap scenarios is true, the "overlapAlert" method is called and the method returns true. Otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      apptId - the Id of the appointment being updated
      apptCustomerId - the proposed appointment's customer Id
      start - the proposed appointment's starting time
      end - the proposed appointment's ending time
      Returns:
      "true" if the proposed appointment time period overlaps any of the scenarios, otherwise "false"
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors
